DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetic drug interaction Solifenacin Tamsulosin healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Investigate Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Between Solifenacin Tamsulosin
DOC.detailed_description: Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Between Solifenacin 10mg Tamsulosin 0.4mg Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 19~45 year healthy male Body weight 55kg , BMI measurement 18.0kg/m^2~ 27.0kg/m^2 Signed inform consent form participate voluntarily comply trial requirement . Researchers determine suitable volunteer physical examination , laboratory test History clinically significant liver , kidney , nervous system , immune system , respiratory , endocrine disorder tumor blood disorder , cardiovascular disease , mental disorder ( mood disorder , obsessivecompulsive disorder , etc . ) Sitting SBP > 150mmHg < 100mmHg , sit DBP > 100mmHg < 60mmHg , 3 minute break An impossible one participant clinical trial investigator 's decision include laboratory test result another reason . Have gastrointestinal disease history affect drug absorption ( Crohn 's disease ulcer , etc ) surgery ( except simple appendectomy hernia surgery ) History drug abuse Positive urine drug screening Administrated investigational product previous clinical trial within 90 day first administration day study . Donated blood within 60 day prior first administration day study .
